Docs.param: The source color used with the specified mode.
The blend mode mode that is applied to each color.
Docs.summary: Creates a new color filter that uses the specified color and mode.
Docs.returns: Returns the new , or if the mode will have no effect.
Docs.remarks: If the is , this function will return (since that mode will have no effect on the result).

MemberSignature.Value: public static SkiaSharp.SKColorFilter CreateColorCube (SkiaSharp.SKData cubeData, int cubeDimension);
.method public static hidebysig class SkiaSharp.SKColorFilter CreateColorCube(class SkiaSharp.SKData cubeData, int32 cubeDimension) cil managed

Docs.param: The cube data in the form of a 3D cube.
The cube's dimension, between and inclusive.
Docs.summary: Creates a new color cube look-up table color filter, where (x, y, z) maps to the (R, G, B).
Docs.remarks: The alpha components of the colors must be 255, or opaque.

MemberSignature.Value: public static SkiaSharp.SKColorFilter CreateColorMatrix (float[] matrix);
.method public static hidebysig class SkiaSharp.SKColorFilter CreateColorMatrix(float32[] matrix) cil managed

Docs.param: An array of elements.
Docs.summary: Creates a new color filter that transforms a color by a 4x5 (row-major) matrix.
Docs.remarks: The matrix is in row-major order and the translation column is specified in unnormalized, 0...255, space.

MemberSignature.Value: public static SkiaSharp.SKColorFilter CreateCompose (SkiaSharp.SKColorFilter outer, SkiaSharp.SKColorFilter inner);
.method public static hidebysig class SkiaSharp.SKColorFilter CreateCompose(class SkiaSharp.SKColorFilter outer, class SkiaSharp.SKColorFilter inner) cil managed

Docs.param: The outer (second) filter to apply.
The inner (first) filter to apply.
Docs.summary: Creates a new composition color filter, whose effect is to first apply the inner filter and then apply the outer filter to the result of the inner's.

MemberSignature.Value: public static SkiaSharp.SKColorFilter CreateGamma (float gamma);
.method public static hidebysig class SkiaSharp.SKColorFilter CreateGamma(float32 gamma) cil managed

Docs.param: The gamma to use.
Docs.summary: Creates a new gamma color filter which can be used to perform pixel-by-pixel conversion between linear and power-law color spaces.
Docs.remarks: A gamma of 2.2 is interpreted to mean convert from sRGB to linear while a gamma of 1/2.2 is interpreted to mean convert from linear to sRGB. Any other values are just directly applied (i.e., out = in ^ gamma).

MemberSignature.Value: public static SkiaSharp.SKColorFilter CreateHighContrast (SkiaSharp.SKHighContrastConfig config);
.method public static hidebysig class SkiaSharp.SKColorFilter CreateHighContrast(valuetype SkiaSharp.SKHighContrastConfig config) cil managed

Docs.param: The high contrast configuration settings.
Docs.summary: Creates a new high contrast color filter which provides transformations to improve contrast for users with low vision.
Docs.remarks: Applies the following transformations in this order: conversion to grayscale, color inversion, increasing the resulting contrast.

MemberSignature.Value: public static SkiaSharp.SKColorFilter CreateHighContrast (bool grayscale, SkiaSharp.SKHighContrastConfigInvertStyle invertStyle, float contrast);
.method public static hidebysig class SkiaSharp.SKColorFilter CreateHighContrast(bool grayscale, valuetype SkiaSharp.SKHighContrastConfigInvertStyle invertStyle, float32 contrast) cil managed

Docs.param: Whether or not the color will be converted to grayscale.
Whether or not to invert brightness, lightness, or neither.
The amount to adjust the contrast by, in the range -1.0 through 1.0.
Docs.summary: Creates a new high contrast color filter which provides transformations to improve contrast for users with low vision.
Docs.remarks: Applies the following transformations in this order: conversion to grayscale, color inversion, increasing the resulting contrast.

MemberSignature.Value: public static SkiaSharp.SKColorFilter CreateLighting (SkiaSharp.SKColor mul, SkiaSharp.SKColor add);
.method public static hidebysig class SkiaSharp.SKColorFilter CreateLighting(valuetype SkiaSharp.SKColor mul, valuetype SkiaSharp.SKColor add) cil managed

Docs.param: The color to multiply the source color by. The alpha component is ignored.
The color to add to the source color. The alpha component is ignored.
Docs.summary: Creates a new lighting color filter that multiplies the RGB channels by one color, and then adds a second color, pinning the result for each component to [0..255].
